Research Papers Read

This site is an archive of interesting research papers that I’ve read, along with the paper’s publicly available PDF. The purpose is largely to share papers that I haven’t been able to post on my blog. The papers are mostly relevant to researchers in decision-making and computational study of behaviour.


  • [ 2019-06-01 ] On Ranking Opportunity Sets in Terms of Freedom of Choice - Pattnaik et al. (2000)
  • [ 2019-05-25 ] The Nature and Measurement of Freedom, Suppes (1996)
  • [ 2019-05-04 ] Zero as a Special Price : The True Value of Free Products, Shampanier et al. (2007)
  • [ 2019-04-07 ] Evaluating Choice, Jones and Sugden (1982)
  • [ 2018-11-15 ] Risk-Taking Behavior in a Computerized Driving Task, Vorobyev et al. (2015)
  • [ 2018-10-01 ] Perception of Risk, Paul Slovic (1987)
  • [ 2018-09-14 ] Emotions and Risk Perception, Lennart Sjöberg (2007)
  • [ 2018-05-04 ] The Effect of Emotion on Risk Decision Making: A Computer Stimulate, Wang et al. (2015)
